name: BurgerPile
description:
Goal of the game is to make as many burgers as you can in a time limit.

Start by picking up bottom burgers bun, then fill it up with each ingredients and finish it up with top burger bun.

The more ingredients you include in a burger the better, but don't repeat ingredients or you will get minus points.

Don't be afraid to make smaller burgers as you get +3 second bonus for each burger you finish.
